issue.title: false positive nip.io
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

It's dns.adguard-dns.com server

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

nip.io

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Why did `nip.io` domain get blocked? This is a legitimate service providing free DNS records. Now it resolves all subdomains to all-zero record.

```
; <<>> DiG 9.18.15 <<>> @dns.adguard-dns.com +tls nip.io 10.0.0.1.nip.io. 127.0.0.1.nip.io
; (4 servers found)
;; global options: +cmd
;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 59608
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 0
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;nip.io.				IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
nip.io.			3600	IN	A	0.0.0.0

;; Query time: 156 msec
;; SERVER: 94.140.14.14#853(dns.adguard-dns.com) (TLS)
;; WHEN: Fri Jun 16 10:26:27 +04 2023
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 51

;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44614
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 0
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;10.0.0.1.nip.io.		IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
10.0.0.1.nip.io.	3600	IN	A	0.0.0.0

;; Query time: 160 msec
;; SERVER: 94.140.14.14#853(dns.adguard-dns.com) (TLS)
;; WHEN: Fri Jun 16 10:26:27 +04 2023
;; MSG SIZE  rcvd: 60

;; Got answer:
;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8048
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 0
;; QUESTION SECTION:
;127.0.0.1.nip.io.		IN	A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
127.0.0.1.nip.io.	3600	IN	A	0.0.0.0

;; Query time: 160 msec
;; SERVER: 94.140.14.14#853(dns.adguard-dns.com) (TLS)

```

Не повторяется, но это не раздражитель.
Бесплатное прослушивание музыки имеет свои ограничения, в том числе то, что перечислено в попапе выше и без этого пользователь не узнает, почему внезапно проигрывание трека остановилось.
Можешь добавить правило `music.yandex.*##.crackdown-popup` в пользовательские.

`iltalehti.fi#%#AG_onLoad(function(){if(-1==document.cookie.indexOf("TcString")){var a=new MutationObserver(function(){var b=document.querySelector("#alma-cmpv2-container button#almacmp-modalConfirmBtn");b&&(a.disconnect(),b.click())});a.observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0});setTimeout(function(){a.disconnect()},1E4)}});`

comment.body:
@BlazDT 
Honestly it's very hard to tell. I wasn't able to reproduce with DNS filtering disabled.

When I enable DNS, it may work, sometimes it doesn't. The page doesn't like frequent Ctrl+F5 refresh and photos starts to load. Then I close and reopen my browser (cleaned Cache and Cookies).
I also do ipconfig -flushdns in between.
The AdBlock screen sometimes appear. 
Adding `gfinityesports.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "admrlLoaded", "true")` with DNS enabled doesn't prevent the screen for me.

issue.title: mail.google.com: app menu incorrectly blocked by annoyances filter

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Annoyances filter 2.1.63.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://mail.google.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

## Description

I am using the AdGuard Annoyances filter in uBlock Origin. One of the filters is blocking the app menu on mail.google.com.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/d62f29389f5b42d95fe3a5727d96a268976f72d0/AnnoyancesFilter/Other/sections/self-promo.txt#L37

As a temporary workaround, I had to add a filter exception:
```
mail.google.com#@#header[role="banner"] > div[class^="gb_"] > div[class^="gb_"][data-ogsr-up] > div[style^="overflow: hidden; position: absolute; top: 0px; width: 370px; z-index:"]
```

## Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1: Blocked element</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1824428/8401e4a6-d6ef-4f43-93f7-cc04e15f5a87)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2: Filter highlighted in uBlock Origin logger</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1824428/e7b17d7d-8083-4d28-af08-cab928960b15)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Planet Rock
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Planet Rock application keeps luanching a popup asking you to rate the app but however many stars you give it you cannot submit it. If you click not now it goes awayfor a few seconds then pops up again. I have been reporting this to them as a bug since January they have released 3 new versions of the app not one as fixed it.

### Proposed solution

Can Adgaurd block this application pop up I have tried enabling popup blockers but I think they are just for websites

### Additional information

I an running OSX Ventura 13.4 on a M1 iMac the Planet Rock app version is now 9.21.3(3937)

issue.title: mail.google.com: app menu incorrectly blocked by annoyances filter

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard Annoyances filter 2.1.63.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://mail.google.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

## Description

I am using the AdGuard Annoyances filter in uBlock Origin. One of the filters is blocking the app menu on mail.google.com.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/d62f29389f5b42d95fe3a5727d96a268976f72d0/AnnoyancesFilter/Other/sections/self-promo.txt#L37

As a temporary workaround, I had to add a filter exception:
```
mail.google.com#@#header[role="banner"] > div[class^="gb_"] > div[class^="gb_"][data-ogsr-up] > div[style^="overflow: hidden; position: absolute; top: 0px; width: 370px; z-index:"]
```

## Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1: Blocked element</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1824428/8401e4a6-d6ef-4f43-93f7-cc04e15f5a87)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2: Filter highlighted in uBlock Origin logger</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1824428/e7b17d7d-8083-4d28-af08-cab928960b15)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with my Google accounts (AdGuard enterprise and personal one ).
@AdguardTeam/filters-maintainers Please take a look.

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://9animetv.to/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F9animetv.to%2F) ### Comment Username: @visiblyannoyedkitten > AdGuard used to block all ads and cancel any attempts of a website to redirect me to another site. HOWEVER, for some reason it’s not doing that anymore!! > On the website I linked (9anime.to) if I try to click ANYTHING it will redirect me to any number of countless scam websites. It opens up a new browsing window, and takes me to a completely different page/site. > This hasn’t ever been a problem for me before, because AdGuard wouldn’t allow them to take me anywhere — but all of a sudden AdGuard stopped blocking them! HELP!! > > I’ve spent the last day and a half trying to figure out what can be done. I’ve updated, made sure all filters are active and on, and tried updating the app several different times too. NOTHING works. When I click the spinning arrows in the top right of the screen, eventually (after I wait forever while it says it’s updating) it gives me the error “Filter update error” and stops. I’ve tried four separate times, just sitting here staring at those circling arrows until the error message pops up. I CAN’T GET IT TO WORK. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ShoZJmt.jpg)

pull_request.title: Create wong1
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [ ] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
Заменил правило JS на скриптлет (оба правила рабочие). Сохраненная страница не отличается от актуальной на сайте.
Выше не повторяется, но есть проблема - если программа была выключена, а сайт открыт, то после включения программы обратно сертификат наш не используется.
Можно решить следующим образом:
- открыть в новой вкладке `chrome://net-internals/#sockets`
- очистить сокеты (прожать обе кнопки).
После этого фильтрация заработает, но это баг и сообщу об этом.
